# create-nextws

[![docs](https://img.shields.io/badge/React-React-blue.svg?logo=React&logoColor=white&label=)](https://reactjs.org/) [![docs](https://img.shields.io/badge/React-TypeScript-blue.svg?logo=TypeScript&logoColor=white&label=)](https://www.typescriptlang.org/) [![docs](https://img.shields.io/badge/React-MaterialUI-blue.svg?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,&logoColor=white&label=)](mui.com) [![docs](https://img.shields.io/badge/React-Zustand-blue.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,&logoColor=white&label=)](https://github.com/pmndrs/zustand)


---
Scaffolding NextJS + NextWS + Strapi, Dockerized

---

## usage



With NPM:

```sh
npm create nextws@latest
```

With Yarn:

```sh
yarn create nextws
```
